Title: The Endling (No. 44)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Noah Schechter, Marisa Tam (story editor), Taylor Martin (story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: Liz and the Task Force hunt for an elusive criminal who is destroying the world's precious treasures. Meanwhile, a surprise encounter leads Red toward a new business opportunity, as Tom investigates the bones in the suitcase.
